title: Green travel guide to New Brunswick
description: Adventure doesn't require a carbon-intensive flight. The post Traveling green in New Brunswick: Your eco-friendly trip guide appeared first on Matador Network.
content: Sure this is a green travel guide and we ll keep it green but it s New Brunswick s actual colors we ll talk most about the warm red tones of the south coast s rocky sea caves that reveal themselves only at low tide The fierce blue grey of the waters chars
